channel.title: Django Round-Up
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast by about the Django web framework, Python, and web development
channel.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
channel.itunes:summary: This is a podcast hosted by Kenneth Love and Brandon Konkle from Lincoln Loop that highlights recent articles and projects in the Django community. We love talking about web development, so our podcast focuses on casual conversations as we cover the latest blog posts and project releases.
channel.description: This is a podcast hosted by Kenneth Love and Brandon Konkle from Lincoln Loop that highlights recent articles and projects in the Django community. We love talking about web development, so our podcast focuses on casual conversations as we cover the latest blog posts and project releases.

item.title: Django Round-Up #1
item.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
item.itunes:summary: For our first official podcast, we were joined by Daniel Greenfeld!
item.description: For our first official podcast, we were joined by Daniel Greenfeld!
